name: Auto Racing Tracks Drift Car
description:
Play this amazing auto racing game and become a pro racer in this car chase battle. Time to show off your amazing driving and car drifting skills. Drive your highly modified racing car on amazing drift tracks. Are you sure your car is ready for the challenge? The opponents are waiting to beat you in this racing battle. You have to prove yourself by racing them out and be a winner at the end.

Here you can compete with other racers, surpass all the racers, win the championship, become the most outstanding car racing driver. How fast you can go thats the real challenge. There is no speed limit so you can use NOS and vanish like a rocket to win this game.

Features
* Extreme Challenging Racing Game
* Amazing HD graphics and sound effects
* Real racer car feeling
* Time constraint game
